Room.Name: Dark Forest Exhibit
Room.ShortDescription: You have wandered into the dark forest exhibit of the Milsene Museum.
Room.LongDescription: It's hard to say where the light, happy forest turned into this dark, gloomy forest with a number of nasty or otherwise evil creatures lurk behind the dense bushes. The trees have grown taller and cover the Museum's skylight, making this area dark and spooky. Mysterious creatures lie in wait behind every stone.
